title: Martin Keown slams "scandalous" Dimitri Payet as West Ham star continues to stay on strike
text:
Sport Martin Keown slams "scandalous" Dimitri Payet as West Ham star continues to stay on strike The Arsenal legend believes the Frenchman knew what he was doing when he signed a contract extension in February Share Click   Martin Keown slams Dimitri Payet for going on strike Share this video   
Arsenal legend Martin Keown has hit out at on-strike West Ham midfielder Dimitri Payet. 
Hammers boss Slaven Bilic revealed on Thursday that the Frenchman has handed in a transfer request and is refusing to play for the east Londoners. 
It comes as a big blow for the Irons who have struggled to nail down any sort of consistency this season. 
The 29-year-old also signed a contract extension in February, keeping him at the club until 2021. 
Many have questioned whether the club have failed to meet the expectations West Ham promised Payet. Dimitri Payet has more than likely played his last game for West Ham (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
But speaking on BBC's Football Focus , Martin Keown believes there was no false pretenses. 
He said: "I feel there's a responsibility as a young man to behave in the right way. No one forced him to sign that contract, he knew exactly what he was doing.   
"Yes he's an outstanding player and he's not happy with the situation, but you have to play. You're there to play. 
"To refuse to play is absolutely scandalous." poll loading Has Dimitri Payet played his last game for West Ham? 2000+ VOTES SO FAR
